rows.label: tlk43200142_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Vandham said you could have
his Merc group, but you're
still a greenhorn, aren'tcha?

rows.label: tlk43200142_02_msg0002
rows.name:
If you've got a real thorny job, send out
a Blade with field skills that match the
task at hand! It'll get done a lot faster!

rows.label: tlk43200142_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Choosing the right Blade for the job
instead of just sending out any old
goon - that's basic stuff, you know!

rows.label: tlk43200142_02_msg0005
rows.name:
He's been in a real foul mood
since Vandham passed on.
